content.body: is there any reason this WPT test doesn't test that `SharedArrayBuffer`s have the same backing block when posted to workers and iframes and back?
content.formatted_body: is there any reason this WPT test doesn't test that SharedArrayBuffers have the same backing block when posted to workers and iframes and back?

content.body: Andreu Botella (he/they): I suspect separation of concerns, but when Domenic is back he might be able to recall
content.formatted_body: Andreu Botella (he/they): I suspect separation of concerns, but when Domenic is back he might be able to recall

content.body: `assertSABsHaveSameBackingBlock` already tests that the objects aren't identical, so I don't think that's the case
content.formatted_body: assertSABsHaveSameBackingBlock already tests that the objects aren't identical, so I don't think that's the case
